dashboard.label: Login Privilege Dashboard
dashboard.description: This dashboard provides visibility into user privilege use and failed logons. It includes EventCode 4672 (Special Privileges Assigned) and EventCode 4625 (Failed Logons).

search.query: index=winlogs sourcetype=WinEventLog:Security EventCode=4672 earliest=-7d@d | stats count by Account_Name | sort - count | head 15
index=winlogs sourcetype=WinEventLog:Security EventCode=4625 earliest=-24h@h | table _time host Account_Name Failure_Reason IpAddress Workstation_Name
